data.title: BAGS--Carrying You through Life
data.dscription: Since the dawn of man, bags have always let people carry more than what they could fit in their hands. The earliest bags were animal skins with folded edges. Over time, bags became more complicated and were made out of new materials like cloth and hemp. Over time, the simple bag has developed to carry almost anything, from items like rice and sand to important things like money and credit cards. Thanks to modern technology, they come in a huge variety of materials, including leather, fur, paper, cloth, and of course, plastic. 詳全文：BAGS--Carrying You through Life
